newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Erste H1 oper profit at 1.074 bln ATS.
newsitem.headline: Erste H1 oper profit at 1.074 bln ATS.

text.p: Austrian savings bank Die Erste Oesterreichische Spar-Casse-Bank AG said on Wednesday first-half group operating profit was at 1.074 billion schillings ($100.9 million).
Die Erste, Austria's biggest savings bank, said parent operating profit in the six months to June 30 was up 14 percent at 848 million schillings.
Group operating income stood at 4.489 billion schillings, while operating costs were at 3.415 billion schillings, the bank said in a statement.
Total assets stood at 269 billion schillings at the end of June, up from 263 billion at the end of last year, it added.

Die Erste on Friday left an Austro-Italian-German group bidding for privatisation candidate Creditanstalt after failing to win backing from its erstwhile partners for its plan to form a joint holding with the flagship bank. -- Knut Engelmann, Vienna newsroom +431 53112 274 ($ = 10.64 Austrian Schillings)
